title: Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech opens 3 October 2015
text:
Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech opens 3 October 2015 Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech opens 3 October 2015 Details Category: Hotel Created   15:45 Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group has announced the opening of Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech on 3 October 2015. A modern and elegant resort nestled in the heart of 20 hectares of olive groves and gardens featuring 100,000 fragrant roses, the property celebrates the rich Moroccan heritage through subtle Berber references. 
The resort redefines luxury hospitality in the Red City by way of accommodation made up solely of private villas and suites set in lush greenery. A new dining experience comes through three restaurants and bars, led by Chef Meryem Cherkaoui. The Spa at Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech offers the renowned signature treatments that have made the group’s international reputation, as well as treatments inspired by Moroccan traditions. The luxury experience is completed by the group’s unparalleled service, allied to the best traditions and hospitality of the Moroccan Kingdom. Related articles
